title: 140 - Jay Joins The Boys!
description: As some of the boys are gone on a top secret business trip, we are joined by the mystery man Jason McAfee. We jump right into it with Gump giving his glowing review of the latest episode in Big Sky, as Tony and others continue to shoot him down. Bill shows off his yinzer accent, and almost almost gets smacked in the mouth by Jay. The boys dive into The Fod which consists of all things popping across the internet like Chet Hanx music video, the latest update in the Avatar movie sequel, F9 trailer, and much more. Nick then sends the listeners into the weekend with some Bangerz. Don't forget to subscribe to our YouTube channel to watch full episodes of the Pod and follow @ThePodPMI on twitter and instagram to send in your submissions to the Pod FOD. we appreciate you all for listening and well see you on Wednesday.
